```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
field <- "publication_place"
```

# Language analysis

 * Catalog: `r catalog`
 * Field: `r field`
 * Country: `r country`  
 * Entries: `r length(subdat[[field]])`
 * Unique entries for this field: `r length(unique(subdat[[field]]))`  


## Top places

```{r top_place, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ntop <- 20
p <- top_plot(subdat[[field]], ntop = ntop) +
       labs(title = paste(catalog, field)) +
       theme_comhis("discrete")
print(p)
```
